title: Long-Term Care Financing Program
context: [CHAPTER 346C LONG-TERM CARE FINANCING PROGRAM] Section 346C-1 Definitions 346C-2 Long-term care financing program; establishment 346C-3 Composition of the board 346C-4 Fiduciary and other obligations of the board of trustees 346C-5 Repealed 346C-6 Investments 346C-7 Annual audits of the long-term care benefits fund 346C-8 Qualified long-term care services Note Long-term care policy goals and guidelines. L 2008, c 224, §§2, 3. Nursing facility sustainability program (repealed June 30, 2016 and December 31, 2016). L 2012, c 156; L 2013, c 142; L 2014, c 124; L 2015, c 69. Revision Note Throughout this chapter, &ldquo;long-term care financing program&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;Hawaii long-term care financing program&rdquo; and &ldquo;long-term care benefits fund&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;Hawaii long-term care benefits fund&rdquo; pursuant to §23G-15. Cross References Coordination and development of caregiver support services, see §349-15. Nursing facility sustainability program, see chapter 346F.
